title: 820 2936 - After 30 min playing FM2017 image broken
message:

title: 820 2936 - After 30 min playing FM2017 image broken
820 2936 - After 30 min playing FM2017 image broken
message: i already replace the ram's.. but i put the same memory (4 GB).. i will try to upgrade for 8 GB! and tomorrow post the results! ty

title: 820 2936 - After 30 min playing FM2017 image broken
message: Also could be a bad RAM slot, usually the closest to keyboard, try only with the other slot....

title: 820 2936 - After 30 min playing FM2017 image broken
message: If it is not bad RAM or a bad slot it will be a CPU problem.

title: 820 2936 - After 30 min playing FM2017 image broken
message: Cpu problem! you can close the post!
